title: Wives of detained Reuters journalists wait for their return as hearings continue
text:
Wives of detained Reuters journalists wait for their return as hearings continue Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 01:33 
Two Reuters journalists have spent 100 days in prison on charges of possessing secret state documents. Julian Satterthwaite reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Two Reuters journalists have spent 100 days in prison on charges of possessing secret state documents. Julian Satterthwaite reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IDQSwq
